[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: ShortArray(
            Bracketed {
                left_bracket: Span(
                    3,
                    1,
                ),
                inner: CommaSeparated {
                    inner: [
                        ArrayItem {
                            key: Some(
                                Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span(
                                                3,
                                                2,
                                            ),
                                            name: "foo",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ),
                            value: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            3,
                                            11,
                                        ),
                                        name: "bar",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            unpack: false,
                            by_ref: true,
                        },
                    ],
                    commas: [],
                },
                right_bracket: Span(
                    3,
                    15,
                ),
            },
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                16,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
